trip_info_sections.title: Entertainment Booking
trip_info_sections.content:
Booking Start: 5:00 PM Thursday in Virgin Voyages App
Walk-ins: Available - 'Sold out' only means no reservations available
Standby Release: 10 minutes before showtime
Rockstar Suites: Reserved space held until 10 minutes before showtime

trip_info_sections.title: Dining Information
trip_info_sections.content:
Reservations: Limited but not necessary
Walk-ins: 40% of tables reserved for walk-ins after 7 PM
Included: All restaurants included in cruise fare
Late Night: Several late-night options available

trip_info_sections.title: First Day Tips
trip_info_sections.content:
1. Look for Atlantis team members in polo shirts with name badges
2. Use meal times to meet other guests at shared seating
3. Don't try to do everything on day 1 - pace yourself
4. Luggage takes time to arrive - pack carry-on essentials

trip_info_sections.title: Virgin Voyages App
trip_info_sections.content: Registration Steps: 6\nNote: Must register in app - cannot register online
